transcript:
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Boliye ab aap boliye sir dekhiye aapke end se jo leads aati jab aapne mera time liya maine aapko time diya aapko maine bola ki mujhe sirf bulk lead aana chahiye main ek ki do piece ki lead mujhe nahi chahiye.
Customer: Aapne mujhse kuch kuch update karwaya ab uske baad bhi do do piece wale ko jawab dete baithunga kya sir main.
Customer: Haan phir aap bolte ho ki aap unko call nahi karte kaise call kare sir jab aage unki requirement do piece ki hai main unko call kaise karu.
Customer: Main jab aapke system mein har baar main jo deny kar raha hu usme main likh ke de raha hu ki mujhe jo lead chahiye hai wo mujhe do low quantity ki order main accept nahi karunga ab uske baad bhi aapke yaha se low quantity ki aa rahi hai to main kaise accept karunga.
Executive: Pratik ji pehle aap puri problem apni bata dijiye phir main aapko revert dunga is cheez ka bahut effective baat karunga aapke sath.
Customer: Ji bata diya mera yahi problem hai.
Executive: Aapka problem ye hai ki jo hai aapke paas bulk lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Do ghante pehle air cooler jhunjhunu Rajasthan se 50 piece ki lead aayi hai aapki 60 lead.
Customer: Sir 50 piece nahi karenge hum.
Customer: Maine aapko bataya sir hum container ke niche nahi karte hamara container minimum 250 piece ka hota hai.
Executive: Ek 300 piece.
Customer: Ye maine aapko update karaya tha.
Executive: Ji ji ji ek 300 piece ki lead hai portable air cooler ki ye aapki Mathura Uttar Pradesh se hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir abhi aayi hogi to reply de dunga aise jitne bhi aapke aaye hai sir quantity wale unko reply diya hai maine abhi main nahi dekh paya hoga ab do ghante pehle aayi hogi main nahi dekha hunga.
Executive: Paanch ghante pehle sir paanch ghante.
Customer: Hua sir svere se aayi hongi kal sham se aayi hongi main nahi dekh paya ab maine dekhna chhod diya na sir.
Customer: Main pehle seriously hoke dekh raha tha ab maine dekhna chhod diya usko dekhne dekhne mein bewakoof ban raha hu aadmi.
Executive: Nahi nahi.
Customer: Sir aapki company mein aapki website pe agar main 40000 30000 dala hu to main shauk ke liye to nahi dala hu mujhe kuch chahiye tha tabhi dala hu.
Executive: Pratik ji mujhe ek baat bataiye.
Customer: Aapke nahi aa raha hai to main aapko claim bhi nahi kar raha hu sir aapke haath se kuch bhi nahi output aa raha hai.
Executive: Nahi aap jab se platform ko use kar rahe ho jab se main aapke sath juda hua hu mujhe achi tarike se yaad hai main sab video meeting bhi aur sab cheez aapke sath jaise juda hua hu main beech mein aapko call bhi karta hu sab kaam karta hu aap bas frustrated rehte ho ye baat bolte ho mere ko.
Customer: Mujhe aapke call ki jarurat hi nahi sir main faltu ke call receive nahi karunga India Mart se lead aayegi mere mujhe aapke.
Executive: Nahi do minute rukiye sir aapki abhi kaun si lead aayi hai na main do minute mein wo call karta hu aur aapko aapka personal number dijiye main call back karta hu dekhna usme kya reply aayega aapka number.
Customer: Lead aayi nahi hui hai lead aayi nahi hui hai lead past lead mein ja chuki hai miss ho chuki hai kehne ka matlab ye hai miss ho chuki hai aapki past lead mein dikhegi India Mart ka agar application open karenge past lead check karenge ja ke waha dikhegi lead.
Customer: Jo achi lead aati hai market ke andar wo char panch sellers ke liye hoti hai lead agar miss kar doge usko to sir miss kar doge kyuki aap jaise bahut sare channel India Mart pehle baithe hue hai.
Customer: Chaliye chhod dijiye sir phir chhod dijiye sir chhod dijiye.
Executive: Pratik ji kya hua.
Customer: Mujhe nahi chahiye aapka follow up aap iske baad koi call nahi karenge mere 40000 rupay dub gaye mujhe koi dikkat nahi uski aap call nahi karenge sir mere ko frustration nahi chahiye chhod dijiye.
Executive: Pratik ji dekhiye is baat ka koi koi samadhan nahi hai cheez jo aap bol rahe ho ki mujhe follow up karna wo mat karna aap mera kaam ki meri zimmedari kya hai Pratik ji ye bataiye.
Customer: [unintelligible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants only bulk leads, not small quantity leads.

- Frustrated with receiving low quantity leads.

- Feels calls are a waste of time.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to explain the problem completely.

- Executive mentioned recent leads, including one of 300 pieces.

- Executive offered to call back to verify a lead.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer does not want follow-up calls.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral | Annoyed -> Risk of churn



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, quantity, frustration
